div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1995 Morino, Val Roveto district near (707) Antinum, 1860? Burial: c. 240-230 B.C. (Crawford) Contents: c. 300 AE Aesernia (as BMC 4) Cales (as BMC 14 ff., 26) Compulteria (as BMC 1) Neapolis (as BMC 209-21) Suessa (as BMC 11, 16-7) Arpi (as BMC 6) Roman Rep. (ROMANO; ROMA issues (see Crawford) Disposition: Garrucci part Garrucci, BullInst 1860, p. 132 Sambon, Recherches, p. 33 Bahrfeldt, RIN 1900, pp. 79-81 Thomsen, ERC I, p. 121 Crawford, RRCH 54
